text: Ganbaataryn Odbayar (born 20 August 1989) is a Mongolian judoka. He competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in the men's 73 kg event, in which he was eliminated in the third round by Nicholas Delpopolo. He won a bronze medal at the 2017 World Judo Championships in Budapest. ==References== Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Mongolian male judoka Category:Olympic judoka of Mongolia Category:Judoka at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Asian Games medalists in judo Category:Judoka at the 2010 Asian Games Category:Judoka at the 2014 Asian Games Category:Asian Games silver medalists for Mongolia Category:Medalists at the 2014 Asian Games Category:Sportspeople from Ulaanbaatar
title: Ganbaataryn Odbayar
